import React from 'react'; import instaImg from "./img/instagram.png" import githubImg from "./img/githubProfile.png" import fbImg from "./img/facebook.png" import twitterImg from "./img/twitter.png" import linkedinImg from "./img/linkedin.png" import contactImg from "./img/about-9.jpg" function submitForm(e){ e.preventDefault() const scriptURL = 'https://script.google.com/macros/s/AKfycbwPeteTqJ1MaFs8vvsFJkRIfkyag-bloOO_yKRUIAd-PciI1BDrCN9wC5cZaXxqU4vP/exec' const form = document.forms['submit-to-google-sheet'] const msg = document.getElementById("msg") fetch(scriptURL, { method: 'POST', body: new FormData(form)}) .then(response => { msg.innerHTML = 'Be patient, I will connect with you shortly....!' setTimeout(function(){ msg.innerHTML = '' }, 5000); form.reset() }) .catch(error => console.error('Error!', error.message)) } function Contact() { return (

Contact Me...

I am available for work. Connect with me via phone:

+91 7028813613 or email ghoneniranjan@gmail.com

img
) } export default Contact
